name: Coding Brains
tagline: Working U.S Day Time | Price Indian
description:
Coding Brains is a Top Mobile App, Product, and Web Development Company. We work Live in USA time 8:00 am PST to 6:00 PM PST, thus minimizing the communication gap and providing value to clients by combining our experience with our commitment to deliver quality service to our customers.
We have worked for more than 100,000 hours of development together with consulting and successfully delivered more than 2000 projects on different technologies and platforms on time in span of 6+ years to clients across 15 countries.
Why work with us?
We program in USA time Zone 8:00 am PST top 6:00 PM PST
Have  Proficient Team of 80+ Developers and Designers
Great English Speaking is just our another Skill Set
Our Project Managers are Leading  Experts   in respective Technologies
Just not Coders but Thinkers as well.
Faster turnaround for projects including for Proof of concepts projects.
Key Services:
Mobile Application Development (Android, iOS, Windows Phone Applications
Web Application Development
Cross Platform App Development
Ecommerce Development
Enterprise Solutions
Hire Dedicated Developers
READ MORE...
